channel.title: Featured on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Featured on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Bot Bounty, a bot for Pentesting & Bug Bounty
item.author: user@example.com (Hugo Author)
item.description: This project is about a Telegram bot with the ability to execute terminal commands from your Telegram account and with the command response as messages.

item.title: WriteUp CTF CIDSI 2018
item.author: user@example.com (Hugo Author)
item.description: This CTF was composed of 74 teams from universities convened nationally for undergraduate and graduate level at the International Congress Of Computer Security (CIDSI in Spanish) which was organized by the Agency of Electronic Government and Information and Communication Technologies (AGETIC in Spanish). Thanks to the efforts of the Computer Incident Management Center(CGII) held from November 29 to December 1, 2018.
